text: 16.2-3 Mat 24.9, Luk 6.22, Jon 9.22, 9.34, 15.21, Apo 8.1, 26.9-11, Lom 10.2, 1 Ko 2.8, 1 Ti 1.13 Nɨbop Juda apnan gɨpal kal okok ag seŋ yokɨl, tepayaŋ ma ownɨmɨb agɨnɨgabal agak. Pen anɨb anep mel agak. Kɨdek ñɨn ak Bapi chɨlopapɨl ma nepal tek, anɨgon God nop tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, nɨbop paklɨnɨgabal agak.
